Draco Slither

By Omer Saleh, Igli Sharka, Jiaming Lin, and Hasnain Mehmood

Content

Fun Facts

Draco Slither is a creature that took over a thousand of years to evolve into what it is today.

If you ever see this creature, make sure you RUN!

Introduction

  • The Draco Slither, also known as the slither dragon in Latin, is a hybrid species that share the features of both a Bald Eagle and a King Cobra
  • It has scales and the skin of a snake instead of feathers
  • Possesses snake-like tongues and the ability to poison its enemies and prey
  • They are feared in both the air and ground
  • Its reptile-like skin allows them to camouflage to its surroundings and its swift stealthy movements allow them to be quick and silent when trying to kill its prey

Etymology

  • The Draco Slither originated from the Americas
  • Can be found throughout all continents due to its special features of survival
  • Draco slither is an appropriate name for the creature because it is a combination of both a slithering snake and a dragon like eagle
  • Capabilites of this creature make it an invasive species no matter where you place it around the world which makes it a threat to humanity.
  • The name originated in Latin which means the Slither Dragon in English
  • The species can be described as a dragon due to its fierce capabilities and also named with slither due to its snake-like features

History & Evolution

  • Draco Slither has survived the ice age and many more disasters due to its genetic mutations
  • Eagles have many issues due to the ice age and so the eagles had migrated to an overpopulated area by king cobras and so many have gone into fights and many from both species died and one day one of the king cobras blood got mixed in with some of the eagles from their death and a lot of blood spilt, over time its blood mutated and soon it had created offsprings.
  • The species of Bald Eagle and King Cobra died and one day one of the king cobras blood got mixed in with some of the eagles from their death and a lot of blood spilt, over time itâ€™s blood mutated and soon it had created offsprings.
  • It was ferociously cold and they had to dig into mountains and try to survive with little to none food.
  • Their extremely high body temperature kept them at least somewhat warm in the mountains.
  • When they didn't have any food, they would either start to kill each other for food or they would send some Draco Slither out to hunt for food.

Habitat & Population

  • Draco Slither is at the top of the food chain and does not have a main predator making it the most dominant species on planet Earth
  • A family of Draco Slither mainly consists of a female and a male version
  • Population= 10,000 birds
  • Lives in pretty much all of the Americas
  • This specie is feared by all types of animals especially those animals that cannot run or fly faster than the Draco Slither

Biology

  • The Draco Slither has body features and DNA features similar to cobras
  • It has an ancestry connection to the King Cobra
  • They adapted to similar environments as King Cobra
  • They were granted the camouflage ability due to having cobra skin that blends with the environment
  • It is completely immune to snake venom due to being adapted to the venom of snakes and cobras.
  • Its wings are similar to Pterodactyl due to not needing feathers on their wings to fly
  • Diet is based on everything that's meat because they are carnivores.
  • It is not a mammal, it lays eggs.

Impact on Earth

  • It's food sources are heavily based on human consumption
  • Draco Slither was the main dominant predator in the sky, with his appearance 92% of different types of species of birds went extinct
  • The Apex predator prevails in air, and has more of a hard time but because of its venom can still kill most land creatures
  • The number of humans alive slowly started to decrease because this creature's existence
